response.overview: When her sister gets blackmailed by a ruthless sex club owner, Dakota James is desperate enough to offer a contract relationship to Jaxon Shaw, a mysterious billionaire who never touches his lovers. Until Dakota. From her first touch, Jaxon starts to feel. Their secret relationship ends brutally when Dakota discovers she's dying and breaks up with Jaxon to protect him. When Dakota gets in too deep with the club owner, she is saved by the masked man Hades-Jaxon in disguise. But time is running out for the fated lovers. Will Jaxon uncover Dakota's deadly secret in time to save her? Or will the forces against them destroy their love before it's too late.
response.title: Take Me Hades, I'm Dying
